revised_title: Investigation of Coagulation Coefficients in Fine Aerosols
tldr: The authors conducted experiments to measure the coagulation coefficient of fine aerosols with varying particle sizes and concentrations. They found that the coefficient of coagulation was higher than previously calculated values and provided a method to evaluate the coefficients of coagulation and wall loss. The study contributes to understanding the behavior of fine aerosols and their applications in various fields.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Aerosol Science
